title: Birdcage, ca. 1959
description: Plan: square center with four turrets; structure composed of numerous glass and brass parts: one large central dome flanked by four small domes on brass roof, all domes of blue-green glass with clear finials; blue-green rectangular panels in-set between domes;  the brass roof and base secured to large clear and white laticino rods by means of brass and glass finials at the top and brass washers at the bottom; walls composed of thin glass rods inserted in brass roof plate and base plates. Removeable glass and brass swings. Square plexiglass undertray.

tombstone.epitaph:
Birdcage, ca. 1959.
ca. 1959. Glass, brass, plexiglass. Gift of Göran F. Holmquist. 1965-50-1-a/tt.
